017package org.apache.juneau.rest.widget;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.bean.html5.HtmlBuilder.*;
020
021import java.net.*;
022import java.util.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.bean.html5.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
029
030/**
031 * Widget that returns back a list of hyperlinks for rendering the contents of a page in a variety of content types.
032 *
033 * <p>
034 * The variable it resolves is <js>"$W{ContentTypeMenuItem}"</js>.
035 *
036 * <p>
037 * An example of this widget can be found in the <c>PetStoreResource</c> in the examples that provides
038 * a drop-down menu item for rendering all other supported content types in plain text:
039 * <p class='bjava'>
040 *    <ja>@RestGet</ja>(<js>"/"</js>)
041 *  <ja>@HtmlDocConfig</ja>(
042 *       widgets={
043 *          ContentTypeMenuItem.<jk>class</jk>,
044 *       },
045 *       navlinks={
046 *          <js>"up: ..."</js>,
047 *          <js>"options: ..."</js>,
048 *          <js>"$W{QueryMenuItem}"</js>,
049 *          <js>"$W{ContentTypeMenuItem}"</js>,
050 *          <js>"$W{ThemeMenuItem}"</js>,
051 *          <js>"source: ..."</js>
052 *       }
053 *    )
054 *    <jk>public</jk> Collection&lt;Pet&gt; getPets() {
055 * </p>
056 *
057 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
058 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HtmlPredefinedWidgets">Predefined Widgets</a>
059 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HtmlWidgets">Widgets</a>
060 * </ul>
061 */
062public class ContentTypeMenuItem extends MenuItemWidget {
063
064   @Override /* MenuItemWidget */
065   public String getLabel(RestRequest req, RestResponse res) {
066      return "content-type";
067   }
068
069   @Override /* MenuItemWidget */
070   public Div getContent(RestRequest req, RestResponse res) {
071      Div div = div();
072      Set<MediaType> l = new TreeSet<>();
073      for (Serializer s : req.getOpContext().getSerializers().getSerializers())
074         l.add(s.getPrimaryMediaType());
075      for (MediaType mt : l) {
076         URI uri = req.getUri(true, CollectionUtils.<String,Object>map("plainText","true","Accept",mt.toString()));
077         div.children(a(uri, mt), br());
078      }
079      return div;
080   }
081}
